title: The Week of Judy Nelson: From Stage to Hero
summary: Judy Nelson, a 39-year-old instructor and producer, unexpectedly gains powers and uses her newfound abilities to fight crime and save her city, all while balancing her everyday job.
summaryGerman: Judy Nelson, eine 39-jährige Lehrerin und Produzentin, erlangt unerwartet Kräfte und nutzt ihre neu gewonnenen Fähigkeiten, um Verbrechen zu bekämpfen und ihre Stadt zu retten, während sie gleichzeitig ihren Alltagsjob meistert.
summaryDutch: Judy Nelson, een 39-jarige instructrice en producente, krijgt onverwacht krachten en gebruikt haar nieuw verworven vaardigheden om misdaad te bestrijden en haar stad te redden, terwijl ze haar dagelijkse baan behoudt.
summaryFrench: Judy Nelson, une instructrice et productrice de 39 ans, acquiert des pouvoirs inattendus et utilise ses nouvelles capacités pour lutter contre le crime et sauver sa ville, tout en équilibrant son travail quotidien.

story.text: Judy Nelson starts her week at the university, teaching a popular film production class. After an unexplained surge of energy during a lecture, she suddenly projects a vivid hologram without any equipment, initially shocking her students and herself.

To understand her new powers, Judy visits an old, secluded library. While researching, she accidentally uncovers a hidden section revealing her city’s mystical secrets. The ambiance is eerie as the books seem to whisper ancient truths.

Armed with knowledge about her abilities, Judy stops a burglary in progress using her holographic projections to disorient the criminals. She feels triumphant, realizing she can truly make a difference.
Despite her heroics, Judy struggles with the idea of leading a double life. Her daytime obligations suffer, and she feels isolated from her peers and students.

Judy meets a charming journalist who is investigating the surge of new hero in town. They spend a captivating evening discussing truth and justice, and Judy feels a romantic connection, relieved to share her burden.

Judy faces her first major challenge: a sinister villain threatening the city’s safety. The battle is intense and epic, broadcasted live, with Judy using her powers in spectacular ways to save numerous lives.

After an exhausting yet triumphant week, Judy spends a peaceful day reflecting on her double life. She resolves to balance her regular life and her duties as a hero, focusing on using her powers for good.

ending: As the sun sets, Judy smiles, knowing her journey has only just begun.
moral: With great power comes great responsibility, but also the opportunity to make a real difference.
